rows.label: qst201906_msg0001
rows.name: *sob*... *sniff*... *hic*...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0002
rows.name:
What is wrong, my dear?
Why are you crying?

rows.label: qst201906_msg0003
rows.name: *sniff* W-Well...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0004
rows.name:
A black-feathered Nopon
ran into me just now.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0005
rows.name:
And my precious clam
hair ornament broke...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0007
rows.name:
I got it for my birthday...
Dad said it was a rare treasure
he got from salvaging...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0008
rows.name:
Grrr! Unforgivable,
black-feathered fool!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0009
rows.name:
To make a cute girl cry, you are
a deviant worse than a beast!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0010
rows.name: Leave it to us, my dear.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0011
rows.name:
We may not be able to get the
same one, but we will find
you a clam hair ornament.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0012
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst201906_msg0013
rows.name: Yes, really! We do not lie.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0014
rows.name:
Hey, Rinne. The black-feathered
Nopon this kid mentioned
might be Suisui...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0015
rows.name:
If we chase after him now, we
might be able to talk to him.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0016
rows.name:
What are you saying?! ...True, the
one million gold is important.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0017
rows.name: But that is all to fulfill our dream.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0018
rows.name:
You know, don't you? Our dream
is to gather all the cute girls
in the world, create a harem...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0019
rows.name:
...and hold an elegant
and fun tea party!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0020
rows.name:
Helping this girl is all for the
sake of fulfilling that wish!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0021
rows.name:
Therefore, we must obtain a
clam hair ornament at once!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0022
rows.name: We are counting on you, Rex!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0023
rows.name: Me again...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0024
rows.name:
But leave it to me! I think I can get
a clam hair ornament at the Goldmund
Flight Deck, so let's go right away!
